name: @vibe-agent-toolkit/vat-example-cat-agents
description: Example agents: 8 quirky cat agents demonstrating VAT patterns

scripts.build:code: bun run generate:resources && tsc && bun scripts/post-build.ts
scripts.duplication-check: echo 'Duplication check not applicable to example packages'
scripts.validate-structure: echo 'Structure validation not applicable to example packages'
scripts.pre-publish: echo 'Pre-publish checks not applicable to example packages'
scripts.test:integration: echo 'No integration tests in example package'
scripts.test:system: echo 'No system tests in example package'

ignoreValidationErrors.SKILL_LENGTH_EXCEEDS_RECOMMENDED: Example package demonstrates comprehensive agent patterns
ignoreValidationErrors.SKILL_TOTAL_SIZE_LARGE: Complete example includes all agent archetypes, tests, and demos
ignoreValidationErrors.SKILL_TOO_MANY_FILES: Example skill references full implementation including detailed docs
ignoreValidationErrors.REFERENCE_TOO_DEEP: Documentation structure follows natural project organization
ignoreValidationErrors.LINKS_TO_NAVIGATION_FILES: Navigation file provides organized entry to examples

author: Jeff Dutton
